Source code for practice.interview.inheritance

"""
Demonstrate inheritance
"""

[docs]class A(object):

[docs]    def go(self):
        print("go A go!")



[docs]    def stop(self):
        print("stop A stop!")



[docs]    def pause(self):
        raise Exception("Not Implemented")




[docs]class B(A):

[docs]    def go(self):
        super(B, self).go()
        print("go B go!")




[docs]class C(A):

[docs]    def go(self):
        super(C, self).go()
        print("go C go!")



[docs]    def stop(self):
        super(C, self).stop()
        print("stop C stop!")




[docs]class D(B, C):

[docs]    def go(self):
        super(D, self).go()
        print("go D go!")



[docs]    def stop(self):
        super(D, self).stop()
        print("stop D stop!")



[docs]    def pause(self):
        print("wait D wait!")




[docs]class E(B, C): pass



if __name__ == "__main__":
    a = A()
    b = B()
    c = C()
    d = D()
    e = E()

    # specify output from here onwards

    a.go()
    print("-----")
    b.go()
    print("-----")
    c.go()
    print("-----")
    d.go()
    print("-----")
    e.go()
    print("-----")

    a.stop()
    print("-----")
    b.stop()
    print("-----")
    c.stop()
    print("-----")
    d.stop()
    print("-----")
    e.stop()
    print("-----")

    a.pause()
    print("-----")
    b.pause()
    print("-----")
    c.pause()
    print("-----")
    d.pause()
    print("-----")
    e.pause()
    print("-----")
